content: ** **> for help and community join our free > fb group 1 ** **the sunny life beanie** **difficulty** intermediate **materials** cygnet chunky 100 gr 100% acrylic 156 m color gold 1 skein color beige 0 5 skein subs can be any weight #4 yarn hook us size j-10 6 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **sizes** regular adult size 23 circumference 9 height **stitch key** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch yo = yarn over **notes** the pattern is worked in row ch1 does not count as st at the beginning of each row each row is worked with 3 different stitches as noted in instructions this beanie is worked in one piece and joined to form you can add a pompon stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
